alert.note: Alert for Bastrop; Lee (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 6:35PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Bastrop and central Lee Counties through 715 PM CDT... At 635 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camp Swift, or 9 miles northeast of Bastrop, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bastrop, Giddings, Fedor, Paige, Circle D-KC Estates, Camp Swift, Knobb Springs, Bastrop State Park, Blue, McDade, Cedar Hills, Hills, Lincoln, Butler, Manheim, Phelan, and Buescher State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
